content:
Are these queries correct?

http://ontoserver.dataproducts.nhs.uk/fhir/ValueSet/$validate-code?system=http://snomed.info/sct&code=886921000000105&url=http://snomed.info/sct/999000031000000106?fhir_vs

http://ontoserver.dataproducts.nhs.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/$lookup?system=http://snomed.info/sct&code=886921000000105

The code is in UK version 20191001 (I've not been able to find when it was added ).

Yes, the queries are correct. As the concept is not found and in the version 20190807 but is in 20191001, I can only assume that it was added in September or October.

michael
That version isn't on the NHS OntoServer? I get the older version in the lookup response http://snomed.info/sct/999000031000000106/version/20190807

How do I post CodeSystem or ValueSets to this server? Has it been locked down.

I've tried adding https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/NRL-ContentStability-1 and https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/ValueSet/NRL-ContentStability-1
POST ValueSet gives 301 and POST CodeSystem returns 200
Thanks. Do you know who are the contacts? I could do with UK CodeSystems and ValueSets being added.
Tim Ireland and Nicholas Oughtibridge are the people you want
